Data Structures

Here are the data structures with brief descriptions:
mc_MT_HITTESTINFOStructure for message MC_MTM_HITTEST
mc_MT_ITEMWIDTHStructure for messages MC_MTM_SETITEMWIDTH and MC_MTM_GETITEMWIDTH
MC_MTITEMAStructure for manipulating with the tab item (ANSI variant)
MC_MTITEMWStructure for manipulating with the tab item (unicode variant)
mc_NM_MT_CLOSEITEMStructure for notification MC_MTN_CLOSEITEM
mc_NM_MT_DELETEITEMStructure for notification MC_MTN_DELETEITEM
